ygData.subject: Re: soulfire and twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: maybe they got it wrong too ;) Lvl50 bard! holy crap, maybe i should get some tips from ya sometime. Lanh - Lv17 Bard, Veeshan ... From: Garramone, Michael
ygData.messageBody:
maybe they got it wrong too ;)

Lvl50 bard! holy crap, maybe i should get some tips from ya sometime.
Lanh - Lv17 Bard, Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 6:40 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] soulfire and twinking


> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> from eq'lizer:
>
> "I know I'll have nothing but huge screenshots of the Soul Fire if I don't
> put this up now. Yes, the Soulfire is in the game now. It seems about two
or
> three paladins now have it. All of them are around leel 18 somehow. We
also
> recieved a guide on how to do the quest, yet I haven't decided if I (not
> sure about J.C.) am going to put this up here."
>
> that's where i got the level 18 info. i don't really want to argue about
> twinking (not you but a previous post). everyone's got an opinion on it.
i
> have a paladin as a second character now, and yes i want the sword. is
the
> paladin twinked? yes, quite a bit. conventional argument is i worked
damn
> hard on my bard and if she can help my other character with items as well
as
> help her get the sword, then great (hey it's her in-game sister after
all).
> i can understand people not wanting every paladin on their server to have
> it.
>
> i would very much like information on this quest and i know no one is
> required to give it, but as of now i know absolutely nothing about it.
>
> sorry that sounds like ranting. i figured any questions about soulfire
> would get this response but i asked anyway cause i'm clueless abour it.
at
> least it may get this list some action it's always dead hehe =)
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Lanhdanan [mailto:lanh@...]
> > Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 12:54 PM
> > To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] soulfire and twinking
> >
> >
> > From: "Lanhdanan" <lanh@...>
> >
> > If it is the pic that im thinking you looked at to confirm
> > its existance,
> > its not a Lv18 that has it, its a Lv18 that is looking at the
> > sword. its at
> > least a Lv20 that actually has it [Jmellow] and I got that
> > from the reason
> > that he has a last name and only Lv20 and above can get those.
> >
> > Lan
> >
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
> > To: <EQ-Quest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 4:46 PM
> > Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] soulfire and twinking
> >
> >
> > > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> > <Michael.Garramone@...>
> > >
> > > I just wanted the info for later, that's why I said "soon."
> > From what I
> > > have seen so far level 18 paladins have this sword. I
> > don't know the
> > level
> > > requirements for the quest, in fact I know nothing of the
> > quest which is
> > why
> > > I was asking.
> > >
> > > Shada
> > >
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: Kevin Byer [mailto:kbyer@...]
> > > > Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 11:53 AM
> > > > To: EQ-Quest@onelist.com
> > > > Subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] soulfire and twinking
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > From: "Kevin Byer" <kbyer@...>
> > > >
> > > > Now that this great sword has been found, I really hope that
> > > > something is
> > > > done to fix the twinking so we don't see level 7 or 8
> > > > Paladins wielding this
> > > > sword. I see its No Drop, but what is someone preventing
> > > > someone else from
> > > > fighting the SK and Lucan and giving the quest components to
> > > > a very low
> > > > level charactor.
> > > >
> > > > Already its a shock to see very very low charactors to be
> > wearing full
> > > > bronze and all the great magic items and weapons.
> > > >
> > > > Aban Steelsoul
> > > > Rathe Server
> > > > -----Original Message-----
> > > > From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> > > > [mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
> > > > Sent: Thursday, July 08, 1999 12:37 PM
> > > > To: 'EQ-Quest@onelist.com'
> > > > Subject: [EQ-Quest] soulfire
> > > >
> > > >
> > > > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> > <Michael.Garramone@...>
> > > >
> > > > looks like the quest to get the paladin only holy sword
> > > > soulfire has been
> > > > completed. if anyone knows about it, please post it here
> > with spoiler
> > > > warnings or email me directly. my sister Erisi would love to
> > > > get it soon.
> > > >
